ars_nouveau.augment_desc.glyph_cut_glyph: Increases the radius in which to look for items to process.
Increases the number of items Cut will process.
Cut will try to process items nearby.
ars_nouveau.augment_desc.glyph_flatten_g: Increases the radius in which to look for items to process.
Increases the number of items Flatten will process.
Flatten will try to process items nearby.
